Translations.Text: Hai you yixie ren, tamen xiujian qingzhensi de mudi shi fanghai chuanjiao, zengjia bu xin he fenlie xinshimen, bing ba ta zuowei yiqian dishi an la ji qi shizhe [mu sheng] de renmen de yige maifu suo. Tamen biding fashi:“Women de yongyi que shi hao de.” Dan an la zuozheng tamen que shi shuohuang zhe.

Ni yongyuan buyao zhan zai zheyang de qingzhensi li libai, zhiyou cong di yi tian qi jiu ba jichu jianli zai jingwei zhi shang de qingzhensi cai zhide ni zhan zai limian libai. Limian you xuduo ai jiejing zhe. An la xihuan jiejing zhe.

Ba jichu jianli zai dui an la de jingwei bing xunqiu ta de xiyue de geng hao ne? Haishi ba jichu jianli zai binlin daota de xuanya bianyuan, yizhi yu ta yiqi zhui ru huo yu [zhu] de geng hao? An la jue bu yindao bu yi de minzhong.
Tamen suo jian de qingzhensi jiang yongyuan shi tamen xinzhong yilu [wei xin] de genyuan, chufei tamen de xin bei qie de fensui [zhidao tamen siwang]. An la shi quanzhi de, zui ruizhi de.

An la que yi yong leyuan huanqu xinshimen de shengming he caichan [zhu 1]. Tamen wei an la zhidao zhandou [zhu 2], tamen sha di he zhenwang. Zhe shi ta [an la] zai “tao la te”,“yin ji lei” he “gulanjing” zhong de zhenshi xunuo. Shei bi an la geng neng shixian ziji de nuoyan ne? Suoyi, nimen dang wei ziji [yu an la] suo zuo de jiaoyi er huanxi. Zhe que shi weida de chenggong.
